description.value:
You create a tune so catchy, your foes can't help but dance along. Attempt a Performance check against the Will DCs of all enemies in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30].

Critical Success The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speed and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed}, both for 1 round.

Success The target takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speed for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target is temporarily immune for 1 hour.
